sentences.en: Affix the blue airmail label and leave the rest to us.
sentences.cn: 贴上蓝色的空邮标签，其余的事情交给我们。

sentences.en: Affix the stamp to the upper right corner of the envelope.
sentences.cn: 把邮票贴在信封上的右上角.

sentences.en: After surveying all the structures with "de", we hold that there are three different "de" in modern Chinese, they are auxiliary verb, auxiliary word and affix.
sentences.cn: 最后，综观现代汉语中与“得”有关的各种结构，本文认为现代汉语中有助动词、助词、词缀三个不同性质的轻声“得”。

sentences.en: As a state between root and affix , quasi - affixes has large mutation.
sentences.cn: 类词缀是一种词根向词缀过渡的状态, 具有很大的变异性.

sentences.en: Clerk: The letter is a little bit heavier. Please affix another stamp.
sentences.cn: 营业员: 这信有点超重, 请再贴一张邮票.

sentences.en: Complete the form and affix four tokens to its back.
sentences.cn: 填完该表，在背面贴上4张凭券。

sentences.en: DO NOT affix the photo to the CPR yourself.
sentences.cn: 切勿自行将相片贴在CPR表格上.

sentences.en: Fixed a bug in the determination of magic affix levels.
sentences.cn: 把一臭虫固定在有魔力附加物水平的决定上.

sentences.en: For withdrawal by seal, please affix the seal at the designated place.
sentences.cn: 凭印鉴去取的, 请在指定位置加盖预留印鉴.

sentences.en: In formation, morphemes are labeled root, stem, base and affix.
sentences.cn: 在构词法中, 语素被分为词根, 词干, 词基和词缀.

sentences.en: Linguistics An asterisk used to indicate an unattested sound, affix, or word.
sentences.cn: 用于表明未被证实的音, 词缀或词的星号.

sentences.en: Morpheme, affix and grammatical ending are the dominant parts in morphology.
sentences.cn: 语素 、 词缀、词尾是形态学的重要组成部分.

sentences.en: Please affix your company's stamp here.
sentences.cn: 请在这里盖上你们公司的章.

sentences.en: Please affix your signature to the document.
sentences.cn: 请你在这个文件上签字.

sentences.en: Secondly review the historical studies about etyma and affix.
sentences.cn: 其次回顾词根与词缀之间的研究情况,就目前来讲,多数汉语言学者都以名词性词根为主要研究对象,对词根是其它词性的情况只限于一般的顺便提及.

sentences.en: We could reprint at a cost of X, or she had found a service that would affix stickers over the price to correct at a cost of X.
sentences.cn: 我们可以按成本价格重新印刷，这将花费X，或根据她找到的一种修正服务，可以重新粘贴上正确的价格，这将花费X。

sentences.en: Will discuss concepts such as phoneme, morpheme , affix, rules and constraints.
sentences.cn: 将被提及的概念包括音位、 语素、 词缀、 规则和限制。

sentences.en: Will discuss concepts such as phoneme, morpheme, affix, rules and constraints.
sentences.cn: 将被提及的概念包括音位 、 语素 、 词缀 、 规则和限制.

words.tran_cn: 粘上；署名；将罪责加之于

trans.tran_en: a group of letters added to the beginning or end of a word to change its meaning or use, such as ‘un-’, ‘mis-’, ‘-ness’, or ‘-ly’
to fasten or stick something to something else
to fasten or stick something to something else
